      • recordBlocks

        public static void recordBlocks(java.util.List<org.bukkit.block.Block> list,
                org.bukkit.Location location)
        Record all the blocks in the list as for an explosion. The location of the explosion is provided.
        Parameters:
        list - The list of blocks.
        location - The location of the explosion.

      • recordBlocks

        public static void recordBlocks(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityExplodeEvent event)
        Record the explosion as a normal one.
        Parameters:

      • recordBlock

        public static void recordBlock(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Record a block to be replaced later, and remove it from the world. The surrounding blocks, if dependent on it, are taken care of.
        Parameters:
        block - The block to record.

      • shouldRemoveLWCProtection

        public static boolean shouldRemoveLWCProtection(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Get whether the explosion created by this entity should remove protection of blocks protected by LWC.
        Parameters:
        entity - The source of the explosion.
        Returns:
        Whether the protection should be removed.
